attributes.action: Offer alternative covid vacine delivery  methods
attributes.additional_details:
Alot of vacine hesitancy is down to either needle phobia or afraid of the side affects of the injection

Offer an alternative that have already been through testing such as the nasal vacine
attributes.background: Push through approval of alternative  divery methods such as nasal sprays & patches

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions on the approval of individual medical products, including products designed to protect against covid-19, are a matter for the independent Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency (MHRA), not the UK Government or Parliament.
